title: Can't Spectate Games?
body: I am trying to view another users game and it is not making it available to me to be able to select "Spectate Game". It is currently just greyed out does anyone have any information about this?

replies.body:
Spectating is not available in the updated client yet. The client is still missing a few features â€” including spectator mode, but they will be rolling out over the next patches.

From [DevBlog](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/3a587e99-6c9b-437a-a03b-7a7ac2be4bf8):
> Before you grab the download, you should understand that this is a **beta**, which means we're still working out a few kinks. The updated client is still missing a few features (like spectator mode) that we'll be adding over the next few patches. It also doesn't yet have some of the flashy animations that we've been working on. We'll take a few patches to turn things on and make optimisations, so if you decide to upgrade now we'll need you to be patient with us while we work everything out.

{{champion:17}}

yeah they haven't brought all the features over yet... clubs spectate... once everything is done i beleive riot are willing to talk about the possibility of a skins tab in collection and bringing item sets back. they are only gone in alpha because they didnt plan to bring them over from the legacy client
Why would they take away spectate? Wouldn't it be better to keep it so you can learn more from games if you have higher elo friends or just to enjoy watching friends?
It's the same for me man. Can't spectate games at all. The same thing was happening in the Alpha client tester
